articles.description: Elon Musk endorses Trump after rally shooting. Former POTUS releases first statement on shooting incident.
articles.content: Elon Musk has finally come out as a vocal Donald Trump supporter in the aftermath of a shooting incident at a Trump rally. Just moments after news broke of the gunfire that rattled the event, Musk to… [+2498 chars]

articles.title: Half of cancer deaths could have been prevented through lifestyle changes, says American Cancer Society report - Fox News
articles.description: As many as 40% of cancer cases — and up to half of cancer-related deaths — could have been prevented, according to a new study from the American Cancer Society. Doctors shared thoughts.
